bio: A wild feline Yo-kai who carries a mighty axe, tears up the mountains and fights bears hand-to-hand! Even his clothing is cheekily wild!

soultimate.name: Axe Slash
soultimate.description: A skilled axe swing which is always a critical hit.

skill.effect: Don’t attack for 15 seconds to make next attack critical.
skill.name: Sheer Focus

name: Kintaronyan
